text: (napiye! Avarkalitam;)"nar ceyalkalaic ceyyunkal; titanaka unkal ceyalkalai allahvum avan tutarum, muhminkalum parttuk kontutanirupparkal; melum, irakaciyankalaiyum, parakacinkalaiyum ariyum iraivanitattil ninkal mittappatuvirkal - appolutu, avan ninkal ceytu kontiruntatai unkalukku arivippan" enru kurum
